name: reverse_php
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool geokeo_forward_geocoding.
Tool description: Geocoding Api for Forward geocoding and Reverse Geocoding with 2500 free api requests
API description: Blazing fast geocoding open service with world wide coverage and 24x7 Support.Quickly start deploying your apps with our affordable and accurate geocoding api.Support for all languages java, python, php, c, c++, React, Angular etc.Sign up without any credit card and get 2500 free api requests daily.

api.description: get your api key for free for 2500 api requests at [https://geokeo.com](https://geokeo.com)

lng.description: The longitude coordinate for the reverse geocoding request.

lat.description: The latitude coordinate for the reverse geocoding request.
